# Android Check

**Source:** [`actions/android-check/action.yml`](https://github.com/futuredapp/.github/blob/main/.github/actions/android-check/action.yml)

Runs lint checks and unit tests.

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: futuredapp/.github/.github/actions/android-check@main
  with:
    lint_gradle_task: '...'
    test_gradle_task: '...'
```

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| `lint_gradle_task` | `string` | Yes | — | A Gradle task(s) for executing lint check, for example `lintCheck lintRelease` |
| `test_gradle_task` | `string` | Yes | — | A Gradle task(s) for executing unit tests, for example `testReleaseUnitTest` or `testDevEnterpriseUnitTest` |
| `github_token_danger` | `string` | No | — | GitHub token for Danger. Must have permissions to read and write issues and pull requests. |
